about_the_game:
Light of Hope™ is a new puzzle-platformer from Gaskellgames.

Light of Hope: The Redeemer

Set aboard The Redeemer, a heavy transport class ship, Spei and the crew must solve a series of challenging puzzles on their journey towards a newly discovered planet. Players must solve gravity bending physical puzzles and challenges in order to get the ship ready for arrival.

The game is designed to change the way players approach, and re-approach, each puzzle as they choose their own play styles based on ability enhancements, equipped outfits, tools and more.

Singleplayer Demo (Coming soon)

In the demo you will play as the loveable M41-U5 (Malus). The short tutorial allows you to get to grips with a selection of abilities from the full game. Can you master them all in order to solve all five unique puzzle rooms?

Product Features

  • Story: Featuring classic puzzle-platformer gameplay that can be completed in both single player and multiplayer split screen.

  • Puzzle Rooms: The game is designed to change the way players approach, interact, and surmise the possibilities in each puzzle encounter. Players must solve physical puzzles and challenges by manoeuvring objects, and themselves, through challenging puzzles and platforming sections.
